text:
Hi,
I have a XSL-FO document with a background image (in JPEG).
I use FOP 0.20.5 to transform it into PDF and PCL (I need both). There is no 
problem with the .PDF, but in the PCL file generated in output, the image is 
not included (the text is ok).
For the transformation, I use the option -PCL in the FOP command.
I've tried with JPEG and BMP images without succes.
Thanks for your help.
Fabrice
creator: malibufp@wanadoo.fr
